dcterms:description: The CHiME-3 corpus features both live and simulated, 6-channel single speaker recordings from 12 different speakers in 4 different noisy environments: caf√©, street junction, public transport, and pedestrian area.

dcterms:description: The AMI corpus features 8 microphones recording overlapping speech in meeting rooms, providing a rich dataset for speech recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: AMI corpus
